    async def fetch\(self\):
        return []

crawler = TestCrawler\(\)
print\(crawler._sanitize_filename\(''马斯克宣布星舰发射计划''\)\)

Bash(d:ai_toolsSingularity-Front.venvScriptspython.exe -c "
import httpx
import asyncio

async def test\(\):
    url = ''https://api-one.wallstcn.com/apiv1/content/lives?channel=global-channel&limit=50''
    async with httpx.AsyncClient\(\) as client:
        resp = await client.get\(url, timeout=30\)
        data = resp.json\(\)
        items = data.get\(''data'', {}\).get\(''items'', []\)
        
        print\(f''总共 {len\(items\)} 条快讯''\)
        print\(''查找 OpenAI 相关:''\)
        for item in items:
            title = item.get\(''title''\) or item.get\(''content_text''\) or item.get\(''content_short'', ''''\)
            if ''openai'' in title.lower\(\) or ''孙正义'' in title:
                print\(f''  - {title}''\)
                print\(f''    URI: {item.get\(""uri""\)}''\)

asyncio.run\(test\(\)\)
")
